summary.span: 代表 XML 元素或屬性的名稱。

span.span: Represents a name of an XML element or attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks XML 名稱包含命名空間和本機名稱。XML names include a namespace and a local name. A*完整限定的名稱*是命名空間和本機名稱的組合。A *fully qualified name* is the combination of the namespace and local name. ## 建立 XName 物件Creating an XName Object 不包含任何公用建構函式。 does not contain any public constructors. 相反地，這個類別提供的隱含轉換，可讓您建立。Instead, this class provides an implicit conversion from that allows you to create an . 您可以使用這項轉換的常見位置是建構的元素或屬性時： 第一個引數建構函式是。The most common place you use this conversion is when constructing an element or attribute: The first argument to the constructor is an . 藉由傳遞字串，您利用的隱含轉換。By passing a string, you take advantage of the implicit conversion. 下列程式碼建立的項目不在命名空間的名稱：The following code creates an element with a name that is in no namespace: ```csharp XElement root = new XElement("ElementName", "content"); Console.WriteLine(root); ``` 在 Visual Basic 中是更適合使用 XML 常值：In Visual Basic, it is more appropriate to use XML literals: ```vb Dim root As XElement = content Console.WriteLine(root) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ```xml content ``` 指派字串給會使用隱含方式轉換。Assigning a string to an uses the implicit conversion from . Visual Basic 範例會建立使用 XML 常值。The Visual Basic example creates the using XML literals. 即使使用 XML 常值時，建立物件。Even though XML literals are used, an object is created for the . 此外，您可以呼叫方法物件。In addition, you can call the method for an object. 不過，建議的方式是使用字串隱含轉換。However, the recommended way is to use the implicit conversion from string. ## 建立命名空間中的 XNameCreating an XName in a Namespace 如同 XML可以位於命名空間，或也可以在沒有命名空間。As with XML, an can be in a namespace, or it can be in no namespace. 適用於 C#，建議的方法來建立命名空間中是宣告物件，然後使用加法運算子的覆寫。For C#, the recommended approach for creating an in a namespace is to declare the object, then use the override of the addition operator. Visual basic 中，建議的方法是使用 XML 常值和全域命名空間宣告來建立命名空間中的 XML。For Visual Basic, the recommended approach is to use XML literals and global namespace declarations to create XML that is in a namespace. ```csharp XNamespace aw = "http://www.adventure-works.com"; XElement root = new XElement(aw + "ElementName", "content"); Console.WriteLine(root); ``` ```vb Imports Module Module1 Sub Main() Dim root As XElement = content Console.WriteLine(root) End Sub End Module ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ```xml content ``` ## 在沒有命名空間中建立 XNameCreating an XName in no Namespace 屬性保證物件不能是 null。The property of an object is guaranteed to not be null. 如果不在命名空間，則屬性會設定為。If the is in no namespace, then the property will be set to . 下列程式碼示範：The following code demonstrates this: ```csharp XElement root = new XElement("ElementName", "content"); if (root.Name.Namespace == XNamespace.None) Console.WriteLine("The element is in no namespace."); else Console.WriteLine("The element is in a namespace."); ``` ```vb Dim root As XElement = content If (root.Name.Namespace Is XNamespace.None) Then Console.WriteLine("The element is in no namespace.") Else Console.WriteLine("The element is in a namespace.") End If ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` The element is in no namespace. ``` ## 使用擴充的名稱Using Expanded Names 您也可以建立從擴充的 XML 名稱，形式`{namespace}localname`:You can also create an from a expanded XML name in the form `{namespace}localname`: ```csharp XElement root = new XElement("{http://www.adventure-works.com}ElementName", "content"); Console.WriteLine(root); ``` ```vb Dim root As XElement = New XElement("{http://www.adventure-works.com}ElementName", "content") Console.WriteLine(root) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ```xml content ``` 請注意，建立透過擴充的名稱是效率比建立物件並使用加法運算子的覆寫。Be aware that creating an through an expanded name is less efficient than creating an object and using the override of the addition operator. 它也是效率比匯入全域命名空間和 Visual Basic 中使用 XML 常值。It is also less efficient than importing a global namespace and using XML literals in Visual Basic. 如果您建立使用擴充的名稱，LINQ to XML 必須尋找不可部分完成的執行個體的命名空間。If you create an using an expanded name, LINQ to XML must find the atomized instance of a namespace. 這項工作必須重複的展開名稱的每個使用中。This work must be repeated for every use of an expanded name. 這個額外的時間是可能會予以忽略，當撰寫 LINQ 查詢;不過，它可能會顯著建立大型的 XML 樹狀結構時。This additional time is likely to be negligible when writing LINQ queries; however, it might be significant when creating a large XML tree. ## 是不可部分完成 XName 物件的XName Objects are Atomized 物件一定不可部分完成;也就是說，如果兩個物件有完全相同的命名空間和完全相同的本機名稱，將會共用相同的執行個體。 objects are guaranteed to be atomized; that is, if two objects have exactly the same namespace and exactly the same local name, they will share the same instance. 相等和比較運算子也會針對此用途明確提供。The equality and comparison operators are also provided explicitly for this purpose. 撇開其他優點，這項功能可讓查詢更快地執行。Among other benefits, this feature allows for faster execution of queries. 當篩選項目或屬性的名稱，以述詞的比較會使用身分識別相較之下，不做數值比較。When filtering on the name of elements or attributes, the comparisons expressed in predicates use identity comparison, not value comparison. 它會更快速地判斷兩個參考實際上會參考相同的物件，比起比較兩個字串。It is much faster to determine that two references actually refer to the same object than to compare two strings.

returns.span: 如果指定的 和目前的 相等，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the specified is equal to the current ; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 兩個物件設為等於，它們必須有相同的擴充的名稱。For two objects to be equal, they must have the same expanded name.

span.span: Gets an object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會提供可讓您建立的多載從擴充的 XML 名稱。This method provides overloads that allow you to create an from a expanded XML name. 您可以建立格式字串從`{namespace}localname`，或從命名空間和本機名稱，個別指定。You can create an from a string in the form `{namespace}localname`, or from a namespace and a local name, specified separately. 更常見且更輕鬆的方式，來建立是使用字串隱含轉換。A much more common and easier way to create an is to use the implicit conversion from string. 若要建立命名空間中的名稱，常見的方法是使用加法運算子多載，可讓您結合物件和字串。To create a name that is in a namespace, the common approach is to use the addition operator overload that allows you to combine an object and a string. 如需詳細資訊和範例，請參閱 < [ 如何： 建立包含命名空間 (C#) (LINQ to XML) 文件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/af4a595e-ffb2-4187-a61b-d5ed71642c4c)。For more information and examples, see [How to: Create a Document with Namespaces (C#) (LINQ to XML)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/af4a595e-ffb2-4187-a61b-d5ed71642c4c). 如需有關如何在 Visual Basic 中使用命名空間的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 在 Visual Basic (LINQ to XML) 中的命名空間](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/10b7ba7b-518c-4f14-899f-892575d14dcc)。For more information on using namespaces in Visual Basic, see [Namespaces in Visual Basic (LINQ to XML)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/10b7ba7b-518c-4f14-899f-892575d14dcc). 因為物件不可部分完成的如果沒有現有完全相同的名稱，與指派的變數會參考現有。Because objects are atomized, if there is an existing with exactly the same name, the assigned variable will refer to the existing . 如果沒有任何現有，新的其中一個會建立並初始化。If there is no existing , a new one will be created and initialized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法所包含的多載，可讓您建立。This method contains overloads that allow you to create an . 您可以從擴充的 XML 名稱，在表單中建立`{namespace}localname`，或從命名空間和本機名稱，個別指定。You can create it from a expanded XML name in the form `{namespace}localname`, or from a namespace and a local name, specified separately. 更常見且更輕鬆的方式，來建立是使用字串隱含轉換。A much more common and easier way to create an is to use the implicit conversion from string. 因為不可部分完成的如果沒有現有完全相同的名稱，與指派的變數會參考現有。Because are atomized, if there is an existing with exactly the same name, the assigned variable will refer to the existing . 如果沒有任何現有，新的其中一個會建立並初始化。If there is no existing , a new one will be created and initialized. ## Examples 下列範例顯示使用這個方法。The following example shows the use of this method. ```csharp XName name = XName.Get("{http://www.adventure-works.com}Root"); XElement el = new XElement(name, "content"); Console.WriteLine(el); // This is the preferred approach for specifying the XName in the // constructor of XElement. XNamespace aw = "http://www.adventure-works.com"; XElement el2 = new XElement(aw + "Root", "content"); Console.WriteLine(el2); ``` ```vb Imports Module Module1 Sub Main() Dim name As XName = XName.Get("{http://www.adventure-works.com}Root") Dim el As XElement = New XElement(name, "content") Console.WriteLine(el) ' The preferred approach for specifying an XName in a namespace ' for Visual Basic is to import a global namespace. Dim el2 As XElement = content Console.WriteLine(el2) End Sub End Module ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` content content ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法所包含的多載，可讓您建立。This method contains overloads that allow you to create an . 您可以從擴充的 XML 名稱的形式建立`{namespace}localname`，或從命名空間和本機名稱，個別指定。You can create it from an expanded XML name in the form `{namespace}localname`, or from a namespace and a local name, specified separately. 更常見且更輕鬆的方式，來建立是使用字串隱含轉換。A much more common and easier way to create an is to use the implicit conversion from string. 因為不可部分完成的如果沒有現有完全相同的名稱，與指派的變數會參考現有。Because are atomized, if there is an existing with exactly the same name, the assigned variable will refer to the existing . 如果沒有任何現有，新的其中一個會建立並初始化。If there is no existing , a new one will be created and initialized. ## Examples 下列範例顯示使用這個方法。The following example shows the use of this method. ```csharp XName name = XName.Get("Root", "http://www.adventure-works.com"); XElement el = new XElement(name, "content"); Console.WriteLine(el); // This is the preferred form. XNamespace aw = "http://www.adventure-works.com"; XElement el2 = new XElement(aw + "Root", "content"); Console.WriteLine(el2); ``` ```vb Imports Module Module1 Sub Main() Dim name As XName = XName.Get("{http://www.adventure-works.com}Root") Dim el As XElement = New XElement(name, "content") Console.WriteLine(el) ' The preferred approach for specifying an XName in a namespace ' for Visual Basic is to import a global namespace. Dim el2 As XElement = content Console.WriteLine(el2) End Sub End Module ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` content content ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性不保證`null`。This property is guaranteed to not be `null`. ## Examples 下列範例顯示使用此屬性。The following example shows the use of this property. ```csharp XNamespace ns = "http://www.adventure-works.com"; XElement root = new XElement(ns + "Root", "content"); Console.WriteLine(root.Name); Console.WriteLine(root.Name.LocalName); Console.WriteLine(root.Name.Namespace); ``` ```vb Imports Module Module1 Sub Main() Dim root As XElement = Console.WriteLine(root.Name) Console.WriteLine(root.Name.LocalName) Console.WriteLine(root.Name.Namespace) End Sub End Module ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` {http://www.adventure-works.com}Root Root http://www.adventure-works.com ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不保證 屬性為 `null`。The property is guaranteed to not be `null`. 如果是在沒有命名空間，此屬性會傳回。If an is in no namespace, this property returns . ## Examples 下列範例顯示使用此屬性。The following example shows the use of this property. ```csharp XNamespace ns = "http://www.adventure-works.com"; XElement root = new XElement(ns + "Root", "content"); Console.WriteLine(root.Name); Console.WriteLine(root.Name.LocalName); Console.WriteLine(root.Name.Namespace); ``` ```vb Imports Module Module1 Sub Main() Dim root As XElement = Console.WriteLine(root.Name) Console.WriteLine(root.Name.LocalName) Console.WriteLine(root.Name.Namespace) End Sub End Module ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` {http://www.adventure-works.com}Root Root http://www.adventure-works.com ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是方便的屬性，以取得命名空間名稱從。This is a convenience property to get the namespace name from an . ## Examples 此範例中的命名空間中建立的項目，並再列印項目的命名空間。This example creates an element in a namespace, and then prints the element's namespace. ```csharp XNamespace aw = "http://www.adventure-works.com"; XElement root = new XElement(aw + "Root"); Console.WriteLine(root.Name.NamespaceName); ``` ```vb Imports Module Module1 Sub Main() Dim root As XElement = Console.WriteLine(root.Name.NamespaceName) End Sub End Module ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` http://www.adventure-works.com ```

summary.span: 傳回數值，指出 的兩個執行個體是否相等。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether two instances of are equal.

returns.span: 如果 和 相等則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if and are equal; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 運算子多載`==`並`!=`包含啟用之間的比較並`string`，例如`element.Name == "SomeElementName"`。The operator overloads `==` and `!=` are included to enable comparisons between and a `string`, such as`element.Name == "SomeElementName"`. 在 C# 中預先定義的參考相等運算子需要一個可以轉換成參考轉換只透過其他類型的運算元。The predefined reference equality operators in C# require one operand to be convertible to the type of the other through reference conversions only. 這些運算子不會考慮字串以隱含方式轉換。These operators do not consider the implicit conversion from string to . ## Examples 下列範例示範一些比較物件和字串。The following example shows some comparisons between objects and strings. ```csharp XName xn; xn = XName.Get("Root"); Console.WriteLine(xn == "Root"); xn = XName.Get("Root", "http://www.adventure-works.com"); Console.WriteLine(xn == "{http://www.adventure-works.com}Root"); XElement root = new XElement("Root", "content"); Console.WriteLine(root.Name == "Root"); ``` ```vb Dim xn As XName xn = XName.Get("Root") Console.WriteLine(xn = "Root") xn = XName.Get("Root", "http://www.adventure-works.com") Console.WriteLine(xn = "{http://www.adventure-works.com}Root") Dim root As XElement = New XElement("Root", "content") Console.WriteLine(root.Name = "Root") ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` True True True ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您建立時，您會使用這個隱含運算子或藉由傳遞字串給適當的建構函式。You are using this implicit operator when you create an or by passing a string to the appropriate constructor. ## Examples 下列範例會建立藉由將字串指派給它，這會叫用此隱含的轉換運算子。The following example creates an by assigning a string to it, which invokes this implicit conversion operator. ```csharp XElement el = new XElement("{http://www.adventure-works.com}Root", "content"); Console.WriteLine(el); // The preferred approach is to initialize an XNamespace object // and use the overload of the addition operator. XNamespace aw = "http://www.adventure-works.com"; XElement root = new XElement(aw + "Root", "content"); Console.WriteLine(root); ``` ```vb Imports Module Module1 Sub Main() Dim el As XElement = New XElement("{http://www.adventure-works.com}Root", "content") Console.WriteLine(el) ' The preferred approach is to import a global namespace and ' use an XML literal. Dim root As XElement = content Console.WriteLine(root) End Sub End Module ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` content content ```

returns.span: 如果 和 不相等則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if and are not equal; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 運算子多載`==`並`!=`會包含啟用之間的比較和字串，例如`element.Name == "SomeElementName"`。The operator overloads `==` and `!=` are included to enable comparisons between and a string, such as`element.Name == "SomeElementName"`. 在 C# 中預先定義的參考相等運算子需要一個可以轉換成參考轉換只透過其他類型的運算元。The predefined reference equality operators in C# require one operand to be convertible to the type of the other through reference conversions only. 這些運算子不會考慮字串以隱含方式轉換。These operators do not consider the implicit conversion from string to . ## Examples 下列 C# 範例會比較為字串，這個運算子會叫用的物件。The following C# example compares an object to a string, which invokes this operator. ```csharp XNamespace aw = "http://www.adventure-works.com"; XElement root = new XElement(aw + "Root", "content"); Console.WriteLine(root.Name != "{http://www.adventure-works.com}Root"); // the following is the preferred idiom Console.WriteLine(root.Name != aw + "Root"); ``` ```vb Imports Module Module1 Sub Main() Dim root As XElement = content Console.WriteLine(root.Name <> "{http://www.adventure-works.com}Root") ' the following is the preferred idiom Console.WriteLine(root.Name <> GetXmlNamespace() + "Root") End Sub End Module ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` False False ```

summary.span: 傳回擴充的 XML 名稱 (格式為 {namespace}localname)。

returns.span: ，其中包含擴充的 XML 名稱 (格式為 {namespace}localname)。

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會呼叫，並傳遞。The following example calls , passing an . 這會導致来呼叫的方法。This causes the method to be called. ```csharp XNamespace ns = "http://www.adventure-works.com"; XElement root = new XElement(ns + "Root", "content"); Console.WriteLine(root.Name); Console.WriteLine(root.Name.LocalName); Console.WriteLine(root.Name.Namespace); ``` ```vb Imports Module Module1 Sub Main() Dim root As XElement = content Console.WriteLine(root.Name) Console.WriteLine(root.Name.LocalName) Console.WriteLine(root.Name.Namespace) End Sub End Module ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` {http://www.adventure-works.com}Root Root http://www.adventure-works.com ```
